id-49340.title: Baby Store
id-49340.post-content:
Want to sell baby products online? Build an online store using our lightweight Baby Store template. The well-designed template is easy to set up and helps you start selling quickly thanks to full integration with WooCommerce.

The template is tailor-made for an online baby store, from subtle colors to having the right images in place. Showcase your latest products, best sellers, deals and offers, and customer reviews, among other things, on the homepage.

Key features of the Baby Store template

  • Elegantly designed website template perfect for an online baby store
  • Use the global palette to customize your store’s colors easily
  • Display products based on categories, best sellers, latest arrivals, and more
  • Showcase client reviews and testimonials
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-49340.post-excerpt: Elegantly designed online store website template for selling all kinds of baby products

id-49829.title: Learn Baking
id-49829.post-content:
An online platform helps break boundaries and reach a wider audience. And with our Learn Baking template, you can offer online courses on baking cookies, pastries, cakes, and more to just about anyone.

The seamless integrations with popular LMS WordPress plugins, such as LearnDash, lets you easily create and manage courses on your website. Showcase your popular courses and testimonials from students who’ve enrolled in your courses on the homepage.

Key features of the Learn Baking template

  • Perfect website template to offer online courses on baking
  • Seamless integration with all popular LMS WordPress plugins
  • Showcase the popular courses and student testimonials on the homepage
  • Publish blogs to not only educate your students but also to be known as an authority
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-49829.post-excerpt: A web template that’s perfect for creating and managing online courses on baking

id-58870.title: Security Services
id-58870.post-content:
Security Services is an impressive design created to portray the seriousness of the topic without being overbearing. The dark homepage image is contrasted by white fonts and a bright red color to help keep you grounded.

The design uses modern fonts and an attractive flat design with great spacing, good use of white space and all the features you would expect to see on a security website.

Key features of the Security Services template

  • Contrasting dark and light elements that make an impact
  • Simple navigation for ease of use
  • Good use of colors with plenty of white space
  • Bold content sections for important messages
  • Simple service section designed for clarity
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-58870.post-excerpt: A template designed to deliver the information clients want to see from a security service

id-53742.title: Travel Blogger & Influencer
id-53742.post-content:
Are you a travel blogger, an influencer, or both? Want to share your travel experiences with the world? Start a blog by using our awe-inspiring Travel Blogger & Influencer template. 

The engaging website template is designed to help you promote yourself as the face behind the blog. Additionally, you can publish blogs, upload and share videos, provide insights into your next travel destination, and even integrate your Instagram feed on your homepage.

Key features of the Travel Blogger & Influencer template

  • Inspiring website template, perfect for travel bloggers and influencers
  • Integrate your Instagram feed on the website
  • Upload and share videos of your various travel destinations
  • Publish blogs on topics related to travel, destinations, tips, and more
  • Fully customizable page builder-ready template
id-53742.post-excerpt: Awe-inspiring website template for bloggers and influencers to share travel experiences

id-55257.title: Local Business
id-55257.post-content:
A website makes you look professional and helps build trust with your prospective clients. Whatever service you offer, be it plumbing, gardening, building maintenance, or painting, you are seen as someone professional and serious about your business by having an online presence.

Our Local Business web template covers you and makes you look every bit professional. Showcase testimonials from your happy customers as well to build trust.

Key features of the Local Business template

  • Professionally designed template that’s tailored to promote your local services
  • List all the services and include a portfolio of your completed work as well
  • Include customer testimonials to enhance trustworthiness
  • Display office hours and integrate Google maps to help customers locate you
  • Global color palettes allow you to customize and play around with the website colors
id-55257.post-excerpt: Professional-looking website template to promote your local business and services

id-55660.title: Heritage Hotel
id-55660.post-content:
Want potential customers to experience the luxury of your heritage hotel from the comfort of their home? The Heritage Hotel template does just that. The classy website design sets the tone and lets potential customers envisage their stay at the property.

From the rooms and suites to the dining experience, and walkthrough of the entire property, your heritage hotel website template comes equipped with everything you need to draw your customer’s attention.

Key features of the Heritage Hotel template

  • Experience royalty with a classy and elegant website design
  • Include details of the rooms and suites, tariffs, and more
  • An impressive gallery to showcase every bit of your hotel
  • Accept online reservations and bookings
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-55660.post-excerpt: Inspiring and classy template perfect for recreating the experience of a heritage hotel

id-55172.title: Steak House
id-55172.post-content:
Do you own a steak house? Want to promote your dine-in and accept orders online? If so, the Steak House web template is perfect for you. The design is attractive and ensures your customers engage with your cuisine instantaneously.

Showcase your mouth watering menu, facilitate online reservations, and include customer reviews, among other things, on your website. Additionally, you can include your working hours and the ambiance photos to help connect with your customers.

Key features of the Steak House template

  • Attractive and engaging website design
  • Showcase your fabulous and mouth watering menu
  • Include customer testimonials and ambiance photos
  • Accept online table reservations
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-55172.post-excerpt: The perfect website template to sell mouth-watering and delicious steaks online

id-57057.title: Business Blog
id-57057.post-content:
Want to build a blog and publish articles on the latest happenings in the business world? Use our Business Blog template. From the stock market and current affairs to startups and new business opportunities, share the latest news and trends with our highly engaging template.

The Business Blog template is well designed and allows for a clutter-free reading experience. You can let readers subscribe to your newsletter and update them every time an article is published. Ideal for any type of business website!

Key features of the Business Blog template

  • Engaging and clutter-free design that enhances user experience
  • Newsletter subscription form that’s well integrated with the templates
  • Well-designed layout that delivers a great reading experience
  • Compatible with all popular page builders
  • Fully responsive and looks great on all device sizes
id-57057.post-excerpt: Share the latest trends in the business world with the perfect business blog template
